oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cart-de-Visite of Lt. Cyrus M. DeLany, 15th US Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: DeLany had served in the 30th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA. He joined the regular army in 1867 as 2nd lieutenant of the 35th US. Inf. Regt. He transferred to the 15th US. Inf. in 1869 and was promoted to 1st lieutenant in 1875 and to captain in 1885. The back of the image is marked "C. M. D., 1st Lt. 15 Infty., Ft. Stanton N.M." He died February 27, 1888.
